publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1078 Irene Oldfather: District 1230 Trip to Virginia-That the Parliament wishes the Rotary District 1230 trip to Virginia in April 2004 every success; notes that the delegation will include representatives from key professions within the local community, including a policeman, a teacher, a journalist and a British Nuclear Fuels worker; welcomes the fact that professionals from Ayrshire will be able to have hands-on experience and exchange examples of good practice with their counterparts in Virginia; commends these professionals to the people of Virginia as fine ambassadors for Ayrshire and Scotland as a whole; welcomes the opportunity to promote Scotland abroad and to further relations between the USA and Scotland, and extends the hand of friendship to any US delegation considering a possible return visit.
S2M-1078 District 1230 Trip to Virginia (lodged on 19 March 2004) Ms Sandra White*
S2M-1078 District 1230 Trip to Virginia (lodged on 19 March 2004) Jackie Baillie*
